name: Kyousouba Ikusei Simulation: Keiba
overview: Kyousouba Ikusei Simulation: Keiba is a game in which the goal is to cross stallions and mares to create the most powerful racehorse in the world. Put your favorite jockey on your racehorse and race him to the top of domestic G1 races and eventually win G1 races abroad! The game takes place in the familiar setting of Japan Racing Association (JRA). JRA's current jockeys, racehorses, and legendary stallions will all appear in the game under their real names. Famous overseas competition horses are also included. Game also supports the communication cable, so you can compete against your friends' horses, and you can exchange racehorse data with your friends.
